event.title: Chemnitzer Linux-Tage in Chemnitz, Germany
event.body: Chemnitzer Linux-Tage is Germany's biggest Free Software conference and takes place on 11 and 12 March in the central building of the University in Chemnitz, Reichenhainer Stra√üe 90. FSFE is present with an information booth, and on Saturday, 11 March, at 16:00 Uhr im Raum V6, Max Mehl speaks about the EU Radio Lockdown Directive. Admission to the whole event is free.
